attributes.action: Keep BBC 6 Music radio station open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that BBC 6 Music be kept open and further that anyone actively involved in the decision to close it should be made to listen to Jedward non-stop for a period of at least 24 hours.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
